app module¶

app.GET_VAR(symbol)¶

Gets the request for which symbol we need to calculate the VaR, calculates the VaR and returns the appropriate respnse.

Parameters:

  • symbol (string) – The symbol/ticker for which we want to calculate VaR.

  • (optional) (days) – The confidence interval for which the VaR is calculated (defaults to 0.95).

  • (optional) – The number of days for which the VaR is calculated (defaults to 1)

Returns:

The result in json structure.

Return type:

json
